definition: to control/to accuse/to charge/to sue/to invert a container to empty it/(suffix) (slang) buff/enthusiast/devotee/-phile or -philia

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: The generator represents magnetron, packaged with constants and electromagnets(2 coils magnetic) in the magnetic-shielded ceramic-metal execution.
sentences.chinese: 该磁控管的设计采用电磁石，封装采用金属陶瓷。

sentences.english: The device comprises an oil cooling system used for cooling anodes of magnetrons in the microwave oven.
sentences.chinese: 该装置包括用于冷却微波炉中磁控管阳极的油冷系统。

sentences.english: The magnetron tube had to be water-cooled, so plumbing installations were also required.
sentences.chinese: 磁控管需要用水制冷，因而还需要安装一些管子。

sentences.english: The calculation and design theory of multicavity magnetron.
sentences.chinese: 多腔磁控管的计算与设计原理。

definition: CRT used in TV or computer monitor/picture tube/kinescope
rectifier (transforming alternating electric current to direct current)
